readability.description: How easy is it to understand the purpose and flow of the function? [0-10] where 0 is very difficult to understand and 10 is extremely clear

modularity.description: How well is the function separated into smaller, focused functions? [0-10] where 0 is a monolithic function and 10 is highly modular

namingConventions.description: How well do the names of variables, functions, and classes convey their purpose and intent? [0-10] where 0 is poor naming and 10 is excellent naming

errorHandling.description: How well does the function handle errors and edge cases? [0-10] where 0 is no error handling and 10 is robust error handling

performance.description: How efficient is the function in terms of time and space complexity? [0-10] where 0 is very inefficient and 10 is highly optimized

tags.description: An array of 3-10 tag strings that describe purpose, intent, architectural features, or business rules
